description: {"blocks":[{"key":"62a8r","text":"This protocol is for target enrichment of cDNA libraries generated with 10x Genomics single-cell RNA-seq assays. The protocol consists of parts of vendor provided protocols with minor modification. The hybridization and PCR part is based on \"CG000059_DemonstratedProtocolExome_RevC\" (10x Genomics) and the capture part is based on \"SureSelectXT Target Enrichment System for Illumina Paired-End Multiplexed Sequencing Library Protocol Version C3, September 2019\" (Agilent).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

Experimental and Computational Methods for Allelic Imbalance Analysis from Single-Nucleus RNA-seq Data. bioRxiv [Preprint]. 2024 Aug 16:2024.08.13.607784. doi: 10.1101/2024.08.13.607784. PMID: 39185246; PMCID: PMC11343128.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
